Date.description: The date of the cryptocurrency data, in the format of MM/DD/YYYY

Open.description: The opening price of the cryptocurrency on the given date, unit is in USD

High.description: The highest price of the cryptocurrency on the given date, unit is in USD

Low.description: The lowest price of the cryptocurrency on the given date, unit is in USD

Close.description: The closing price of the cryptocurrency on the given date, unit is in USD

Adj Close.description: The adjusted closing price of the cryptocurrency on the given date, unit is in USD

Volume.description: The volume of the cryptocurrency traded on the given date, unit is in the number of coins

Currency.description: The type of cryptocurrency, such as Bitcoin, Etherium, etc

value_dict.Etherium: A type of cryptocurrency known as Etherium
value_dict.Bitcoin: A type of cryptocurrency known as Bitcoin
